doc.headline: Typhoon Haiyan
doc.post:
So awful to read about the devastation this has caused. My heart goes out to everyone effected. I hope all our BE members are safe
http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/world-asia-24878801

Likewise. Just stopped by this board to say I hope everyone is okay and to stay safe.
There are loads of Pinoys in the UAE, so we're all concerned here.

I have had contact with my friend in Palo just outside Tacloban he has lost his roof and also the roof,s off his apartments which was his only income..as for other friends there i don't know. Also just heard a brg in Samar where i spent many weeks over the years is ok.
Just got back from Philippines taking relief aid to dolores eastern samar driving to tacloban on way to airport was heart breaking so much devastation there

I have only just joined this site but I was there in Malapascua for 3 weeks helping the locals clearing the trees and rebuilding their houses. Such a beautiful place before and give it time it will recover. I am going back to Philippines in March for 1 month scuba diving
Charlie
